title: Don't Pass On Tua
itunes:title: Don't Pass On Tua
description:
Colin discusses the possible NFL draft rating numbers, the lasting power of Michael Jordan’s brand, why passing on Tua Tagovailoa would be a mistake, why the new process for the NFL draft shouldn’t be an excuse for GMs, and his thoughts on Draymond Green's comments on Kevin Durant’s final season with the Warriors. Guests include Peter Schrager, Al Michaels, and Russell Wilson.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
